summary: A film that explores the rivalry between the Indiana Pacers and New York as seen through the eyes and actions of Reggie Miller star player of the Indiana Pacers.
cast: Reggie Miller|Cheryl Miller|Spike Lee|Patrick Ewing|Donnie Walsh|Marv Albert|Steve Alford|Woody Allen|Greg Anthony|Bill Benner|Ira Berkow|Mark Boyle|Larry Brown|Mel Daniels|Antonio Davis|Dale Davis|Hubert Davis|Dave DeBusschere|Jack Edwards|Chris Fowler|Mike Francesa|Mel Gibson|Rudy Giuliani|Ernie Grunfeld|Bob Gutkowski|Mark Jackson|Magic Johnson|Michael Jordan|Bobby Knight|Bob Leonard|Tonya Lewis Lee|Anthony Mason|Charles Oakley|Keith Olbermann|Dan Patrick|Soon-Yi Previn|Michael Rapaport|Ahmad Rashad|Pat Riley|Jimmy Roberts|Robin Roberts|Byron Scott|Jerry Seinfeld|Charles Smith|Rik Smits|John Starks|Charley Steiner|David Stern|LaSalle Thompson|Mike Tirico|Donald Trump|Jeff Van Gundy|Peter Vecsey|Herb Williams
title: Winning Time: Reggie Miller vs. The New York Knicks
